response.answer_text: Hey I have found the answer of your question in another site and it’s quite easy.I don’t wanna copy paste it so I’ll leave you the link if you wanna check it out later. How to add music to instagram stories

Instagram is mostly visual social media platform - focused on pictures and videos more than any other social media. You can create a video with this background music before uploading to Instagram. To avoid need to create content by yourself, you can download and use content under various types of creative commons licenses: Videos - Creative Commons It is also reasonable to adapt this video formats to Instagram platform formats - because they uses very different (square and vertical) formats as compared to TV or Youtube. So, it is better to reformat that output video into portrait (vertical) orientation before uploading it to Instagram The easiest way to do this is using online tools. For example, Tappable Vertical Video Maker - Crop & Blur Videos To Fit Social Media is a free tool that converts horizontal video content into a vertical one. 1080X1080, 1080x1350 (4:5), 1080x1920 (9:16) vertical video formats are supported for output.It is mostly focused on content creators and videographers to create better video content for Instagram and IGTV.

Hey there, might be a tad late to the party however you can now add songs and music to Instagram stories in a number of ways: You can link to Spotify Song inside your Instagram StoryYou can choose from thousands of songs and directly embed them into your Instagram Story while you’re recording orYou can choose from thousands of songs and directly embed them into your Instagram Story after you’ve recorded a video (you can also clip and trim to your heart’s content)You can also add music to your Instagram Stories from your camera roll :)I made a quick YouTube tutorial explaining the above (check it out below) - hope it helps!  You can also check it out here: https://paulramondo.com/how-to-add-music-to-instagram-stories/

Tap the Camera button in the upper left corner of Instagram to open the Story camera. At the camera screen, swipe up to access the Control Center of iOS then swipe over to access the Music screen and tap on the Play button to start playing your music
